about_the_game:
Brave the Known World and lead one of five asymmetric races to vanquish your enemies and push back the Timefront. Recruit, combat and expand your territory in this thrilling new take on the old and beloved genre.

Cinematic Campaign

Immerse yourself on a rich, character-driven story and fight back against Oroch to reclaim the lands lost to the Timefront. This roguelike campaign will ensure replayability is fresh and engaging in every run.

Build Your Own Strategy

Choose your race, hero, units and artifacts to customize your own playstyle before the game begins. Tweak your composition after every match to min/max your strategy.

Multiplayer

Test your skills on casual skirmishes against players from around the world. You can take it one step further and try the competitive ladder and tournaments for rewards.

Raids

Party-up with your friends or guildmates to overcome difficult scenarios against the AI in this challenging co-op game mode.

Custom Game

Use Worldshaper, Timefront's game editor, to build your own custom games and publish them. If they become popular with the community, you can monetize them.

Lets build a great game, together!

Brave the Known World and lead one of five asymmetric races to vanquish your enemies and push back the Timefront. Recruit, combat and expand your territory in this thrilling new take on the old and beloved genre.

Immerse yourself on a rich, character-driven story and fight back against Oroch to reclaim the lands lost to the Timefront. This roguelike campaign will ensure replayability is fresh and engaging in every run.

Build Your Own Strategy

Choose your race, hero, units and artifacts to customize your own playstyle before the game begins. Tweak your composition after every match to min/max your strategy.

Multiplayer

Test your skills on casual skirmishes against players from around the world. You can take it one step further and try the competitive ladder and tournaments for rewards.

Party-up with your friends or guildmates to overcome difficult scenarios against the AI in this challenging co-op game mode.

name: Timefront

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Timefront is a high-fantasy, real-time strategy game with deck-building mechanics. Explore the story behind the characters on its roguelike campaign, play with friends on co-op challenges, or with the community on innovative custom games. Try this refreshing take on the old and beloved genre!
